Detailed Description

Provides generic methods for singleton classes. A singleton class can only have 1 instance running at a time.

static AbstractSingleton::GetInstance (   )  [static, abstract]
 

Gets a unique instance of current class. Create it if it doesn't exist. Children must call parent::getInstance( __CLASS__ )

This method MUST be redefined in ALL children.

Returns:
unique instance of current class
See also:
AbstractSingleton::getThis()

Reimplemented in WebSitePage, XHTMLSitePage, AbstractSitePage, Application, and Session.
